title: Pandemic has made people cosy up to tech: Amar Babu, President, Asia Pacific, Lenovo - The Financial Express
content: Pandemic has made people cosy up to tech: Amar Babu, President, Asia Pacific, Lenovo  The Financial Express
description: Furthermore, building accessibility features into technology can unlock the potential of millions of under-served Indians. These include women and girls, people from remote areas, those using minority languages, and people with disabilities.
